column1: The Purple Pig////The Purple Pig is probably one of my favorite restaurants in Chicago. They do not take reservations as they do it first-come-first serve style. As a result
column2: I recommend trying to arrive early to put your name down
column3: but expect a 1.5-2 hr wait to be safe. Fortunately
column4: you're in Chicago and near Mag Mile
column5: so boredom won't be an issue. Seating is a bit tight as quarters are quite close
column6: but it allows for an intimate setting with your party and even possible light conversation with complete strangers
column7: especially if you are all seated at the same table.
